SELECT m1.id AS id, ( CASE WHEN (m2.id = 0 OR m2.id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE m2.id END ) AS pId, m1. NAME AS NAME, ( CASE WHEN (m2.id = 0 OR m2.id IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen FROM sys_menu m1 LEFT join sys_menu m2 ON m1.pcode = m2. CODE ORDER BY m1.id ASC
